じょりじょり: (じょりじょり) - scrape-scrape; (with a) scraping sound

じり安: (じりやす) - gradual decline (of stock prices)
じり貧: (じりひん) - gradually becoming poor; situation getting gradually worse and worse
じり高: (じりだか) - gradual rise in prices

じろりと見る: (じろりとみる) - to throw a glance
じわじわ: (じわじわ) - slowly (but steadily)/gradually/bit-by-bit; slowly soaking in/slowly permeating/oozing out/seeping out
じんじん: (じんじん) - tingling sensation (e.g. in a leg)/feeling numb/painful tingle/throbbing; noisily/ears ringing
じんと: (じんと) - extremely cold feeling that makes one feel numb/sharp pain that is almost numbing; heartrending/touching the heart
じん性: (じんせい) - toughness (of a material); tenacity; fracture toughness
じん肺: (じんぱい) - pneumoconiosis (lung disease caused by dust inhalation)
じーんと: (じんと) - extremely cold feeling that makes one feel numb/sharp pain that is almost numbing; heartrending/touching the heart

すえ臭い: (すえくさい) - smelling of rotten food and drink
すか: (すか) - nonsense; loss (on scratch lottery tickets, etc.)

すかすか: (すかすか) - hollow; sharply/cleanly (of cutting); smoothly
すかっと: (すかっと) - refreshed/clear; to feel refreshed
すかり: (すがり) - net for caught fish; net-like tassel of Buddhist prayer beads; (すがり only)   Vespula flaviceps (species of yellowjacket); (すがり only)   ant; (すかり only) easily
すがり: (すがり) - net for caught fish; net-like tassel of Buddhist prayer beads; (すがり only)   Vespula flaviceps (species of yellowjacket); (すがり only)   ant; (すかり only) easily

すき身: (すきみ) - thin slice of meat or fish; briefly salt-pickled fish slice
すき間: (すきま) - crevice/crack/gap/opening; spare moment/interval/break/pause/spare time; chink (in one's armor, armour)/unpreparedness/carelessness

すくい取る: (すくいとる) - to dip out; to scoop up; to ladle out

すくすく: (sukusuku) - (growing) quickly (especialmente crianças, plantas), (developing) quickly, fast, rapidly
すくみ上がる: (すくみあがる) - to cringe with fear; to cower with fright; to be terribly afraid

すごみを利かせる: (すごみをきかせる) - to threaten; to intimidate

すじ違い: (すじちがい) - cramp/sprain/crick/strain (muscle); unreasonableness/absurdity; illogical/unreasonable; misdirected/misplaced/wrong (of estimate, guess)
すすり上げる: (すすりあげる) - (usu. 鼻を...) to sniffle/to snuffle; to sob
すす払い: (すすはらい) - cleaning dust etc. from rooms/housecleaning; (the traditional Japanese end-of-the-year, 13th December) big house cleaning/spring cleaning (only not in spring)
すす掃き: (すすはき) - sweeping the soot from one's house (to welcome the kami of the New Year)
すずめの涙: (すずめのなみだ) - drop in the bucket; very small quantity; chicken feed; insignificant amount; sparrow tears

すたすた: (すたすた) - (walk) briskly; at a brisk pace; quickly
